models.sentence:
The mice were divided into eight groups randomly.

The models mentioned in the article are:

* Apoptotic I (4T1 tumor-bearing mice induced by DOX)
* Apoptotic II (4T1 tumor-bearing mice induced by DOX twice for 3 d)
* Normal group (4T1 tumor-bearing mice without treatment of DOX)

These groups are used to evaluate the amplifying apoptosis-targeted property of MNPs
